dialogue.text: E aha te heiva rahi i Tahiti?

dialogue.translation: C'est le Heiva i Tahiti, le plus grand festival / It's Heiva i Tahiti, the biggest festival

instruction.fr: Associez les traditions à leurs descriptions

pairs.tahitian: Fare tabu no te mau tahua

pairs.description: Traditional body art with spiritual meaning
pairs.tahitian: Te tā'iri tinito ma te mana

text.fr: La culture polynésienne est riche en traditions millénaires. Le concept de 'mana' (pouvoir spirituel) imprègne tous les aspects de la vie. Les marae étaient des centres spirituels et sociaux. Le tatau (tatouage) raconte l'histoire personnelle et familiale. La navigation traditionnelle en va'a témoigne de l'expertise maritime polynésienne. Le rahui protège les ressources naturelles selon les cycles lunaires. Ces traditions continuent de guider la vie moderne en Polynésie.
text.ty: Te haapiira'a porinētia e rahi ai te mau tu'una matahiti ato'a. Te mana e rave nei i te mau mea atoa o te ora. Te mau marae o te mau 'āfata varua ma te feti'ara'a. Te tatau e parau nei i te pārau ta'ata ma te 'utuāfare. Te tere tupuna i te va'a e fa'a'ite nei i te mātau moana porinētia. Te rahui e paruru nei i te mau rauemi taiao e tia ai te mahina. Teie mau tu'una e fa'aora tonu nei i te ora taime nei i Porinētia.
text.en: Polynesian culture is rich in ancient traditions. The concept of 'mana' (spiritual power) permeates all aspects of life. Marae were spiritual and social centers. Tatau (tattoo) tells personal and family history. Traditional navigation in va'a demonstrates Polynesian maritime expertise. Rahui protects natural resources according to lunar cycles. These traditions continue to guide modern life in Polynesia.

summary.fr: Vous comprenez maintenant les traditions polynésiennes fondamentales. Cette connaissance vous aidera à apprécier la richesse culturelle de Tahiti et de ses îles.
summary.ty: Ua mārama nei 'oe i te mau tu'una porinētia pū. Teie mātauraa e 'oa ia 'oe e māita'i ai i te rahi haapiira'a o Tahiti ma tōna mau motu.
summary.en: You now understand fundamental Polynesian traditions. This knowledge will help you appreciate the cultural richness of Tahiti and its islands.

keyPoints: Mana is the spiritual force that connects all things
Traditional practices continue to influence modern life
Respect for nature and ancestors guides Polynesian values
Cultural preservation is essential for future generations
